name: Notion Notebook Dashboard
description: Keep your notes organised A simple Notion dashboard to help you file and organise your notes.Features Includes: Filing of notes in different notebooks List of recent notes for quick access Review your notes before archiving them Notified of unfiled notes FAQsIs the template free to use?Yes it's free!If you enjoy the product, you can help out by leaving a rating or donating :)How to download the template?Open the template link, then click "Duplicate" on the top right corner to duplicate it to you
features: Filing of notes in different notebooks; List of recent notes for quick access; Review your notes before archiving them; Notified of unfiled notes
